clearDelegate(bytes32).details: Clears a delegate for the msg.sender and a specific id.      The combination of msg.sender and the id can be seen as a unique key.

params.id: Id for which the delegate should be set

setDelegate(bytes32,address).details: Sets a delegate for the msg.sender and a specific id.      The combination of msg.sender and the id can be seen as a unique key.

params.id: Id for which the delegate should be set
